name: HE-MAN
description:
HE-MAN is an international bi- monthly lifestyle publication
devoted to providing definitive coverage of the everyday
lives of the contemporary man. HE-MAN explores plethora of men’s interests provided by experts, which include: Health & Fitness, Sex & Relationships, Fashion & Grooming, Careers, Self-improvement and modern lifestyle.

name: Monroe - Volume One
description: MONROE IS A WOMEN'S LIFESTYLE PUBLICATION, PUBLISHED BI-ANNUALLY. THE PUBLICATION IS TARGETED TOWARDS A DEMOGRAPHIC COMPOSED WITH STRONG AFFLUENT WOMEN. EACH VOLUME OF MONROE IS THEMED AROUND ONE INSPIRING WOMAN. THIS MEANS EACH VOLUME OF MONROE PROVIDES A STORY AND DEEP INSIGHT INTO THE LIVES OF INSPIRING AND GLOBALLY RECOGNISED WOMEN. MONROE ENCOURAGES WOMEN TO EXPLORE AND CELEBRATE ALL ASPECTS OF THEIR LIVES, IT NOT ONLY UNITIES, BUT EMPOWERS AND INSPIRES WOMEN ALL AROUND THE WORLD. DUE TO A POWERFUL INTERNATIONAL EDITORIAL TEAM AND COLLABORATIONS WITH INTERNATIONALLY ACCLAIMED, JOURNALISTS, PHOTOGRAPHERS, ARTISTS AND DESIGNERS, THIS PERMITS US TO PRODUCE ENGAGING AND HIGHLY PRODUCED CONTENT THUS MAKING MONROE EASILY IDENTIFIABLE IN AN OVER POPULATED MARKET OF WOMEN'S PUBLICATIONS

name: When Good Becomes The Enemy (Religion Issue)
description: Volume 3 of the L'Altro Uomo series, "When Good Becomes the Enemy" highlights how religious terrorists have kidnapped the word of God, and use it to discriminate others. Volume 3 investigates the causes, the influences, of the past the present and the future of Religion. L'Altro Uomo also covers Architecture, Art, Design & Technology, Fashion and Photography.

name: Sleeping With MANhattan
description:
I have been sleeping with Manhattan for  7 years.  It’s a rocky relationship.   In the summer, I enjoy him all night long, dining and dancing until the sun calls me home.  During the winter, MANhattan turns cold on me, icy, and I want to leave him for St Bart’s.  I end up staying, waiting for him to embrace me with warmth once again. MANhattan is not always a good boyfriend he can leave you worn and torn, bitter, angry and low, like you don’t belong.  It’s a wear and tear kind of relationship.  But it doesn’t mean you get to leave him, no, you have to do the exact opposite, hold on tight and wear the storm.  .  

Our days are filled with business, but in the night time we are all about fun.  I won’t bore you with tales of everyday work, I want to excite you.  I want to entice you to try him out yourself (I don’t mind sharing). In a city full of illusion, dating and mating comes with a price, but when you do it right, you are the one left feeling full not empty.   Embrace it with open arms, and though it may initially feel like a horrible roller coaster, it quickly becomes a joy ride and you will raise your hands high in the air at every bump and turn.  The city may have been named after man but it’s made up of fabulous women.  

Dating in New York is not about following the rules of the game, there are too many, but you need to be highly aware of the rules and all the players to properly assess the field.  If MANhattan is a war zone this book is your boot camp. Let’s make being single fun again.

name: Leggere Tra Le Righe Dell'Omophobia
description:
"Leggendo tra le righe dell'omofobia" è un libro compassionevole e perspicace sul conflitto tra i fondamentalisti religiosi e gli uomini e donne omosessuali.

Il libro identifica la radice dell'omofobia, e fornisce una profonda analisi delle tradizioni e della religione. "Leggendo tra le righe dell'omofobia" spiega il contesto culturale e storico delle citazioni dell'Antico Testamento che sono costantemente richiamate e utilizzate come giustificazione per le argomentazioni contro l'omosessualità. Il libro sottolinea anche l'errata traduzione e manipolazione che ha portato a incomprensioni circa il vero significato delle Sacre Scritture. "Leggendo tra le righe dell'omofobia" è un libro accuratamente organizzato ed efficace. Il libro copre tutti i settori fontamentali delle cause dell'omofobia. Ogni capitolo fornisce al lettore una vasta gamma di ricerche sulla Storia, la Psicologia e la Giurisprudenza.

name: Reading In Between the Lines of Homophobia
description:
Reading in between the lines of homophobia’ is a compassionate and insightful book about the conflict between religious fundamentalists and gay men and women. 

The book identifies the root of homophobia, and provides a profound analysis of tradition and religion. Reading in between the lines of homophobia explains the cultural and historical context of the Old Testament quotes which are consistently referenced and used as justification for arguments against homosexuality. The book also points out the translation misinterpretation and manipulation which has resulted in misunderstandings about the real meaning of the scriptures. Reading in between the lines of homophobia is a carefully organised and effective book. The book covers all the fundamental areas of the causes of homophobia.  Each chapter provides the reader with a wide range of research into History, Psychology and Law.

name: The Fashionist By Fosco Giulianelli
description: Fosco Giulianelli, or better known as “The Fashionist” was first introduced  street fashion by his mother as a child in Perugia, Italy. Remarkably fate led him into starting a website based on street style. Initially the concept of starting a website of photographs of  fashionably dressed people who he would meet publicly provoked,intrigued and challenged him. Years on, The Fashionist is one of the world’s most widely read fashion websites. Fosco Giulianelli, takes us back to the basics and walks us through his journey into becoming the world renowned “Fashionist” He shares his compelling and inspirational story and showcases his preferred street  fashion from the streets of Stockholm, Paris, Florence, Milan and London, including  photographs of iconic fashion figures.

name: All The World's A Stage
description: Photographer Enrico Leucci captured the world as though it was on a stage, and we were the protagonists. This breath-taking collection of black and white photography depicts a cinematic scene of everyday street life, which narrate intriguing stories that provide a profound insight and a provocation of thought. If a picture speaks a thousands words, this book will be difficult to silence.

name: No One's Child
description: No One's Child gives a profound and thoughtful account of the lives of the “invisible people” The “invisible people”  are those who many walk by everyday without taking any notice or giving a second thought. Each photograph permits you to look  further and deeper into the lives of the homeless, and helps you learn  to see the people in them. No One's Child recounts their real life stories, and exhibits them in beautiful black and white photography. One must look beyond the pictures, looks at their emotions,their motives, their fears, lies and ambitions. This is someone's child, this book shows people who can be understood, who can be related to, and who can be helped. In order for this to be achieved we must first begin to look.

name: What Lies Beneath
description: What Lies Beneath outlines the  distinct stages of emotional and identity struggle by those who  identified themselves to be different, to the demands and pressures of culture, society and family. The book recounts the journeys taken by several individuals on the path of  discovery and self acceptance. Each account profoundly and uniquely articulates the underlying issues of identity struggle. The confusion, challenges, self manipulation, pain and in some cases danger. Each one of the authors lend their shoes for readers to walk in. What Lies Beneath is an compelling testament that will influence, inspire, and positively change the lives of those who read it.

name: Till Death Do Us Part (The Love Issue)
description: “Love is much like a wild rose, beautiful and calm, but willing to draw blood in its defence” Mark Overby “People who are sensible about love are incapable of it” Douglas Yates “The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread” Mother Teresa “Till death do us part” is the fascinating love volume produced by L'Altro Uomo. The love volume provides a multitude of insightful and fascinating stories, studies and editorials about the different aspects of modern love. Special features include real life experiences such as: “The secret Adulterer” “The Invisible Injury” by Writer Nicola Gray and “No Man's Land” by Editor in Chief Jerry Osei-Tutu.

name: Beauty Is on the Outside (The Face Issue)
description:
The unspoken truth....it is however the reality in which we live our lives and that truth is manifested every day.   We like to reiterate that “beauty is skin deep” however skin deep doesn’t grant us liberty, power, fame or money. Reality shows us that we are conditioned by society and by each other based on what we and others look like.  If others find us physically appealing they treat us better and they respect us more. Studies have shown that there are more opportunities in personal and professional life based on beauty.

Some try to tell the world that they take themselves too seriously to care about what others think by convincing themselves that they do not care.  They exempt themselves from the fashion and beauty industry, media, celebrities and society.  What if the decisions we make while deciding what to wear for the day is potentially crucial rather than superficial.... would you then think twice about what you put on your back before your left your home?  Let’s be honest image matters. When was the last time you didn’t judge someone based on what they looked like? Treated someone better or chose to get to know someone you were not attracted to?

L’ALTRO UOMO brings you THE FACE, the issue highlights our growing obsession with perfection, the causes, the influences, of the past the present and the potential future. In this issue we bring you Fashion highlights from Milan and Paris Fashion week, The Psychology of Fashion, Best Dressed List, Foreign skin our controversial undercover story. The best of: Architecture, Photography, Art and design from around the world.  Including Health and Fitness, Grooming, thought provoking stories, articles and many more.
